content: Posted https://internals.rust-lang.org/t/final-async-await-testing-push/10423 calling for help adding tests
Feel free to add items to the list-- just leave a comment assigning yourself and link to the PR when you have one (or a playground link if you'd like someone else to PR it)

Hi, I'm able to help with some tests for async/.await this week, and per the dropbox paper there seems to be some tests that haven't been written, or at least haven't been updated as being written. I wrote up one batch of tests and can get going on more, although I'm not exactly positive i'm testing what you intended exactly.

https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/63310

I previously spoke with @centril about helping and I see that @Taylor Cramer posted the test scenarios. Thanks!
